content: Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for this physical artwork viewable here:(The full Transmutation NFT animation with audio can be viewed as an Augmented Reality layer over the physical artwork with the free Artivive app.)links with video here: Soon!if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)Physical artwork in size 100 x 100 cmCollectors Edition 1 of 1Bitcoin Radiance1. - “Bitcoin Radiance” --- SOLDEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsPayment:Payment address Bitcoin: 3CDxDhHppj1Vyjfb771WjUNiS28UvR5EZyPayment address Bitcoin Lightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.comBitcoin RadianceExplore the enigmatic beauty of “Bitcoin Radiance,” a mesmerizing acrylic painting that measures 100cm x 100cm. This unique artwork was skillfully crafted using a palette knife technique, resulting in a textured and captivating masterpiece that draws you in.Inspired by the electric atmosphere of the last conference in London, “Bitcoin Radiance” is a one-of-a-kind creation that encapsulates the spirit of innovation and the mystique of cryptocurrency. The painting features a central motif of a skull, symbolizing the intrigue and complexity surrounding the crypto world. A subtle moon hovers in the background, casting an ethereal glow, while above, a shimmering shift occurs as a vibrant Bitcoin sun emerges to illuminate the path forward.This artwork is a singular creation, 1 of 1, making it an exclusive addition to your collection. Along with its aesthetic allure, “Bitcoin Radiance” comes with several benefits and certificates, attesting to its originality and quality.Embrace the mystery and radiance of the crypto universe with “Bitcoin Radiance,” a masterpiece that invites you to explore the depths of this transformative world. It’s not just an artwork; it’s a journey, a story, and a testament to the ever-evolving landscape of digital currency._____________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0
